release.description: This release of the Profile Setup application is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Profile Setup application is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Profile Setup application is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.

This release of the Update Tool is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This release is intended as a prototype release in support of the assessment of the PDS4 standards and the system components to date.
release.action: Initial capabilities for transferring logs and updating the Sawmill database.
